de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.sea.jingle.connection.media

Class RawTransmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.sea.jingle.connection.media.RawTransmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RawTransmitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The RawTransmitter is used to transmit Datagrams (UDP). It uses the Raw Objects which may be appended to a sending queue

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_PAYLOAD_LENGTH
      The maximum length of a Datagram packet which should be sent
      private boolean opened
      Boolean which declares whether this RawTransmitter should send data
      private java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<Raw> queue
      Queue which holds Object to be send
      private java.net.InetAddress remoteHost
      IP address (remote)
      private int remotePort
      Port (remote)
      private java.net.DatagramSocket socket
      Socket to send datagram packets
      private boolean transmit
      Boolean to determine whether this RawTransmitter should transmit

              java.net.InetAddress remoteHost,

        Constructor for a RawTransmitter
        Parameters:
        queue - the LinkedBlockingQueue which may be used to append new Raw items
        socket - a DatagramSocket to send packets
        remoteHost - the IP address of the remote host
        remotePort - the port of the remote host
